keyMoments.title: Wadatsumi Debut
keyMoments.description: Wadatsumi appears and knocks out a giant anglerfish that was attacking the Thousand Sunny, showcasing his massive size and strength.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction of Wadatsumi, who will become a significant character in the Fish-Man Island arc.

reveals.information: Giant Fish-Man with immense size and strength

name.japanese: バンダー・デッケン九世

keyMoments.title: Vander Decken IX Silhouette
keyMoments.description: Vander Decken IX appears as a silhouette aboard the Flying Dutchman as it emerges in the deep sea.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Vander Decken IX as a mysterious new antagonist who will play a major role in the Fish-Man Island arc.

reveals.information: Captain of the Flying Pirates and the Flying Dutchman

keyMoments.title: Megalo Debut
keyMoments.description: Megalo appears as a shark that the Monster Trio follows toward Fish-Man Island after defeating the Kraken.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Megalo, who will be revealed as Princess Shirahoshi's companion.

reveals.information: Large shark swimming near Fish-Man Island

keyMoments.title: Monster Trio vs Kraken
keyMoments.description: The Kraken battles Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji, serving as the test for their post-timeskip abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Provides the first major challenge to showcase the Monster Trio's growth.

keyMoments.title: Tamed by Luffy
keyMoments.description: After being defeated, the Kraken is tamed by Luffy and given the name Surume.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's ability to win over even fearsome creatures, establishing Surume as an ally.

relationships.description: Tamed by Luffy after being defeated in battle. Named Surume by Luffy.

evolutionMoments.description: Defeated and tamed by Luffy, becoming a temporary ally.

reveals.information: Named Surume by Luffy after being tamed
Becomes Luffy's ally after being defeated

keyMoments.title: First Use of Armament Haki
keyMoments.description: Luffy demonstrates Busoshoku Haki (Armament Haki) for the first time, hardening his Gear Third arm to a black, shiny appearance.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Luffy's first visual use of Armament Haki, a fundamental power-up that defines his New World battles.

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Elephant Gun Debut
keyMoments.description: Luffy unleashes his new signature attack combining Gear Third with Armament Haki, knocking out the Kraken with one blow.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of Luffy's most iconic post-timeskip techniques.

keyMoments.title: Tames the Kraken
keyMoments.description: After defeating the Kraken, Luffy tames it through intimidation and names it Surume.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's natural charisma and ability to win over creatures.

abilities.description: Luffy can harden his body parts to a black, shiny appearance, increasing attack power and defense.
A Gear Third technique where Luffy enlarges his arm and hardens it with Armament Haki to deliver a devastating punch.

relationships.description: Luffy defeats and tames the Kraken, naming it Surume.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy defeats the Kraken and tames it, establishing it as a temporary ally.

reveals.information: Can use Armament Haki to harden his body
Learned Gomu Gomu no Elephant Gun during timeskip training

keyMoments.title: Santoryu Ogi: Rokudo no Tsuji Debut
keyMoments.description: Zoro unleashes his new Three Sword Style ultimate technique, severing the Kraken's tentacle with devastating power.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Zoro's mastery after training with Mihawk, revealing a powerful new finishing move.

abilities.description: Three Sword Style Secret Technique: Six Paths Crossroads - A powerful cutting technique that can sever massive targets.

reveals.information: Learned new ultimate Three Sword Style technique during timeskip

keyMoments.title: Blue Walk Debut
keyMoments.description: Sanji demonstrates his new ability to move freely underwater using Blue Walk, an underwater variant of Sky Walk.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Sanji's adaptation of his mobility techniques for underwater combat.

keyMoments.title: Diable Jambe: Bien Cuit Debut
keyMoments.description: Sanji unleashes an enhanced version of Diable Jambe with greater heat intensity, burning the Kraken's tentacle.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the evolution of Sanji's signature fire-based attacks after the timeskip.

abilities.description: An underwater movement technique that allows Sanji to move freely in water, similar to Sky Walk.
An enhanced version of Diable Jambe with intensified flames, meaning 'Well Cooked' in French.

reveals.information: Developed Blue Walk for underwater mobility
Enhanced Diable Jambe with greater heat output

keyMoments.title: Traps Caribou
keyMoments.description: Franky discovers Caribou plotting in a barrel and seals him inside to protect the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Prevents Caribou from harming the crew and sets up his continued presence in the arc.

keyMoments.title: Multiple Coup de Burst Uses
keyMoments.description: Franky uses Coup de Burst four times to escape sea creatures, but each use shrinks the protective bubble.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the limitations of using Coup de Burst underwater.

keyMoments.title: Discovered and Trapped
keyMoments.description: Caribou is discovered by Franky while scheming to kill the Straw Hats and is sealed inside a barrel.
keyMoments.significance: Neutralizes Caribou as a threat while keeping him present for future developments.

reveals.information: Plotting to kill the Straw Hats while hiding on their ship
